links.*: Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien
The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide

wikitext.*:
On [[25 April]] [[1937]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Charles Furth'''.<ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}, pp. 194-5</ref>

*'''Subject:''' Tolkien replies to a letter from Furth from [[15 April]], regarding the jacket design for ''[[The Hobbit]]''.
*'''Publication:''' Quotes from the letter appears in ''[[The Hobbit 50th Anniversary]]'',<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=65980|articlename=The Hobbit 50th Anniversary. 1987|dated=|website=TB|accessed=8 July 2012}}</ref> and in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide]]''.<ref name=CG/>
*'''Archive:''' The letter is kept at the Tolkien-George Allen & Unwin archive.<ref name=CG/>

==See also==
*[[Letter to Charles Furth (19 December 1937)]]
